document.discussion_title: Numis Securities Ltd Trims Capital & Counties Properties PLC (CAPC) Target Price to GBX 273
document.topic_text: Tweet Capital & Counties Properties PLC (LON:CAPC) had its price objective decreased by Numis Securities Ltd from GBX 321 ($4.13) to GBX 273 ($3.52) in a research note published on Tuesday. Numis Securities Ltd currently has a hold rating on the stock. In related news, insider Hawksworth,Ian sold 600,000 shares of the business’s stock in a transaction that occurred on Wednesday, May 25th. The stock was sold at an average price of GBX 346 ($4.46), for a total transaction of £2,076,000 ($2,673,190.83). Other equities analysts have also recently issued research reports about the company. Citigroup Inc. reiterated a buy rating and set a GBX 396 ($5.10) price objective on shares of Capital & Counties Properties PLC in a report on Monday, July 18th. Barclays PLC cut Capital & Counties Properties PLC to an equal weight rating and cut their price objective for the company from GBX 400 ($5.15) to GBX 320 ($4.12) in a report on Thursday, July 7th. Liberum Capital reiterated a hold rating and set a GBX 300 ($3.86) price objective on shares of Capital & Counties Properties PLC in a report on Tuesday, July 26th. JPMorgan Chase & Co. reiterated an overweight rating and set a GBX 80 ($1.03) price objective on shares of Capital & Counties Properties PLC in a report on Thursday, May 12th. Finally, Deutsche Bank AG cut their price objective on Capital & Counties Properties PLC from GBX 310 ($3.99) to GBX 260 ($3.35) and set a sell rating on the stock in a report on Thursday, June 16th. Nine equities research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, three have given a hold rating and four have assigned a buy rating to the company. The stock has an average rating of Hold and an average target price of GBX 325.63 ($4.19). Shares of Capital & Counties Properties PLC ( LON:CAPC ) opened at 284.40 on Tuesday. Capital & Counties Properties PLC has a 52 week low of GBX 257.20 and a 52 week high of GBX 454.32. The stock has a 50 day moving average of GBX 285.35 and a 200 day moving average of GBX 321.85. The firm’s market cap is GBX 2.40 billion. The firm also recently announced a dividend, which will be paid on Friday, September 30th. Investors of record on Thursday, September 8th will be issued a dividend of GBX 0.50 ($0.01) per share. This represents a dividend yield of 0.18%. The ex-dividend date of this dividend is Thursday, September 8th. Capital & Counties Properties PLC is a United Kingdom-based property company. The Company’s principal activity is the development and management of property. The Company’s segments include Covent Garden, Earls Court Properties, Venues and Other. It is organized into four divisions: Covent Garden; Earls Court Properties, which represents its interests in the Earls Court area, comprising properties held in Earls Court Partnership Limited (ECPL), Lillie Square, the Empress State Building and a range of smaller properties in the Earls Court area; Venues, which comprises the exhibitions business, including the Olympia London property assets and Maclise Road1, and Other, which comprises the discontinued activity of The Great Capital Partnership, the Company’s residual China investments, other head office companies and investments. Capital & Counties Properties PLC Capital & Counties Properties PLC
